DOC.brief_summary: Although positive oral contrast agent use majority abdominopelvic CT scan United States , quality bowel opacification compare three major class positive oral contrast material ( barium sulfate , ionic iodinate contrast material , non-ionic iodinate contrast material ) . This retrospective single institution study clinical record show whether uniformity bowel opacification different three main type positive CT oral contrast material use United States ( Barium sulfate , Diatrizoate , Iohexol ) . The investigator retrospectively identify 250 patient receive oral barium sulfate , diatrizoate , iohexol CT scan abdomen pelvis ( total 750 patient ) assess quality bowel lumen opacification positive oral contrast agent .
DOC.detailed_description: Although positive oral contrast agent use majority abdominopelvic CT scan United States , quality bowel opacification compare three major class positive oral contrast material ( barium sulfate , ionic iodinate contrast material , non-ionic iodinate contrast material ) . The investigator retrospectively identify 250 patient receive oral barium sulfate , diatrizoate , iohexol CT scan abdomen pelvis ( total 750 patient ) assess quality bowel lumen opacification positive oral contrast agent . Primary objective : - To show uniformity bowel opacification different three main type CT oral contrast material use United States ( Barium sulfate , Diatrizoate , Iohexol ) . Secondary objective : - To show whether one oral contrast agent provide uniform opacification others proximal distal bowel - To assess relative opacification distal small bowel ( ileum ) three contrast agent .
